content: single_crochet 2/2 treble_crochet in single_crochet 3/1 treble_crochet 1 dtr 1 treble_crochet in single_crochet 4/ 2 treble_crochet in single_crochet 5/ double_crochet in single_crochet 6/ half_double_crochet in single_crochet 7/ end with a slipstitch in single_crochet 8 fasten_off leave a long enough tail pin the wings on the side of the body on round 17 till 28 sew on the wings with the left over yarn don t sew the pointy end of the wing leave it loose so you can spread the wings a bit tail use light blue cotton yarn to avoid a hole you need to start it with a double magic_ring part 1 round 1 6 single_crochet stitches 6 single_crochet round 2 2 single_crochet in each stitch from last round 12 single_crochet round 3 12 single_crochet round 4 12 single_crochet round 5 12 single_crochet round 6 2 single_crochet decrease 1 single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet repeat times 9 single_crochet end with a slip_stitch and fasten_off 5 part 2 round 1 6 single_crochet stitches 6 single_crochet round 2 2 single_crochet in each stitch from last round 12 single_crochet round 3 12 single_crochet round 4 12 single_crochet round 5 12 single_crochet round 6 2 single_crochet decrease 1 single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet repeat 3 times 9 single_crochet round 7 18 single_crochet follow the pictures picture 1 you ve got two parts of the tail 1 is finished off picture 2 put your crochet needle in the first single_crochet of part 1 6 picture 3 yarn over make a single_crochet to fasten both parts together picture 4 crochet along 1 single_crochet in each single_crochet of part 1 make 9 single_crochet then cross over to part 2 in to single_crochet 5 of part 2 and crochet 1 single_crochet in each single_crochet of part 2 in the end you have 18 single_crochet from part 1 and 9 from part 2 round 8 18 single_crochet round 9 4 single_crochet decrease 1 single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet repeat 3 times 15 single_crochet round 10 15 single_crochet round 11 3 single_crochet decrease 1 single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet repeat 3 times 12 single_crochet round 12 12 single_crochet round 13 12 single_crochet round 14 fold both sides together and crochet them together with 6 single_crochet fasten_off leave a long enough tail pin the tail on the back of the body on round 29 and sew it on 7 paws make 2 use orange cotton yarn to avoid a hole you need to start it with a double magic_ring round 1 6 single_crochet stitches 6 single_crochet round 2 2 single_crochet in each stitch from last round 12 single_crochet round 3 12 single_crochet round 4 12 single_crochet round 5 2sc decrease 1 single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet repeat 3 times 9 single_crochet round 6 9 single_crochet round 7 9 single_crochet round 8 9 single_crochet end with al slip_stitch fasten_off leave a long enough tail take a piece of 5 cm 2 inch chenille thread bent the thread in half and put it in to your first paw the curved part
